====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{n-g|Sentence-final particle expressing surprise.}}
#: {{zh-x|你 不 來 '''啊{a}'''？|So you're not coming?}}
# {{n-g|Sentence-final particle expressing exclamation, excitement or enthusiasm.}}
#: {{zh-x|多 好 的 天兒{r} '''啊{a}'''！|What a fine day!}}
#: {{zh-x|謝謝 '''啊{a}'''|Thanks.}}
# {{n-g|Sentence-final particle softening the request.}}
#: {{zh-x|老 ^王 '''啊{a}'''，這 可 不行 '''啊{a}'''！|Wang, this won't do!}}
# {{n-g|Used in enumerations, for confirmation (often untranslated).}}
#: {{zh-x|錢 '''啊{a}'''，書 '''啊{a}'''，表 '''啊{a}'''，我 都 丟 了。|Money, books, watch, I lost everything.}}
# [[on and on]], [[continuously]]

====Usage notes====
In speech, this toneless particle is found in complementary distribution with several other particles, governed by the nature of the preceding syllable. However, this distinction is not strictly reflected in writing, and {{lang|zh|啊}} tends to an all-encompassing particle. Thus it may carry the pronunciation of any of its variants below in actual speech:

* ''-ng, ci, zi, si, chi, zhi, shi'' + [a] → {{lang|zh|啊}} [a]
* ''-a, -o, -e, -i, -ü'' + [a] → {{zh-l|*呀}} [ya]
* ''-u, -ao'' + [a] → {{zh-l|*哇}} [wa]
* ''-n'' + [a] → {{zh-l|*哪}} [na]
